00032 /*************************************************************************/
00043 /*************************************************************************/
00044 void collisionDetected(Sprite* objA, Sprite* objB)
00045 {       
00046         //Send event to the player's collision handler
00047         if (objA->SpriteType == PlayerType)
00048         {
00049                 HandleCollision(objB);
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 /*************************************************************************/
00064 /*************************************************************************/
00065 void rectangleRectangleCollision(Sprite* objA, Sprite* objB)
00066 {
00067         //Get the positions and offset for quick access
00068         Vec2 posA = objA->Position;
00069         Vec2 posB = objB->Position;
00070         Vec2 offA = objA->CollideOffset;
00071         Vec2 offB = objB->CollideOffset;
00072 
00073         //Collidable 1
00074         float leftAx   = posA.x + offA.x - (objA->CollideSize.x / 2);
00075         float rightAx  = leftAx + objA->CollideSize.x;
00076         float topAy    = posA.y + offA.y + (objA->CollideSize.y / 2);
00077         float bottomAy = topAy - objA->CollideSize.y;
00078 
00079         //Collidable 2
00080         float leftBx   = posB.x + offB.x - (objB->CollideSize.x / 2);
00081         float rightBx  = leftBx + objB->CollideSize.x;
00082         float topBy    = posB.y + offB.y + (objB->CollideSize.y / 2);
00083         float bottomBy = topBy - objB->CollideSize.y;
00084 
00085         //Check if all requires for collision are true
00086         if (leftAx < rightBx && rightAx > leftBx && topAy > bottomBy && bottomAy < topBy)
00087                 collisionDetected(objA, objB);
00088 }
00089

00092 {
00093 }

00112 /*************************************************************************/
00120 /*************************************************************************/
00121 void searchForIntersection(Sprite* objA)
00122 {
00123         //Sort through the objects to find which to detect collision
00124         int j;
00125         for (j = 0; j < OBJECTAMOUNT; j++)
00126         {
00127                 Sprite* objB = (objectList + j);
00128                 //Make sure the sprite exists
00129                 if (objB && objB->Created == 1 && objB != objA && objB->CanCollide == 1)
00130                 {
00131                         //Run detection based on type
00132                         if (objB->SensorType == RectangleCollider && objA->SensorType == RectangleCollider)
00133                                 rectangleRectangleCollision(objA, objB);
00134                         else if (objB->SensorType == CircleCollider && objA->SensorType == RectangleCollider)
00135                                 circleRectangleCollision(objA, objB);
00136                         else if (objB->SensorType == RectangleCollider && objA->SensorType == CircleCollider)
00137                                 circleRectangleCollision(objB, objA);
00138                         else if (objB->SensorType == CircleCollider && objA->SensorType == CircleCollider)
00139                                 circleCircleCollision(objA, objB);
00140                 }
00141         }
00142 }
00143 
00144 /*************************************************************************/
00149 /*************************************************************************/
00150 void DetectCollision(void)
00151 {
00152         int i;
00153         for (i = 0; i < COLLIDEAMOUNT; i++)
00154         {
00155                 //Make sure the sprite exists
00156                 if (collidables[i].Created == 1)
00157                 {
00158                         //Check for collision (We will assume everything in the collidables list CanCollide)
00159                         searchForIntersection(&collidables[i]);
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 }
